ResearchProjectDef.label: basic fuses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build makeshift fuses out of steel strips. Each one is enough to dissipate up to 2500 Wd (over two standard batteries) discharge, but will burn out if exceeded.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced fuses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build proper fuseboxes out of plasteel rods. Each one is enough to dissipate up to 3000 Wd (three standard batteries) discharge, and will never burn itself out.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar flare shielding
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a magnetic shield that will protect electric devices in your colony from solar flares.
